mapper.select: SELECT a.PART_TYPE,a.ATTR_KEY,a.ATTR_VALUE FROM mb_part_attr a,mb_attr_type b WHERE PART_TYPE = #{partType,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND a.attr_key = b.attr_key AND b.attr_class = #{attrValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert:
insert into mb_part_attr
PART_TYPE,
ATTR_KEY,
ATTR_VALUE,
COMPANY,
#{partType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{attrKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{attrValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{company,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
